name: mt-storage
description: `web storage` 的二次封装、提供`TS`类型支持

scripts.cp:type: cp src/throttle/buildTypes/index.d.ts dist && cp src/throttle/buildTypes/throttle.d.ts dist && cp src/throttle/buildTypes/task.d.ts dist
scripts.plugin:build: pnpm run ts:build && pnpm run build && pnpm run cp:type
scripts.plugin:build:push:npm:package: pnpm run plugin:build && pnpm run push:npm:package

author: matias tang
